Key Match Events: Harry Brook finished the job with a fluent 42 not out
Phil Salt was brilliantly caught by Haider Ali
Dawid Malan was caught and bowled immediately after launching the leg-spinnerâ€™s loosener for six
Ben Duckett made an enterprising 21 before falling lbw on the sweep
Haider holed out off Sam Curran
Iftikhar Ahmed scored 28 runs including three sixes
Mohammad Nawaz's off stump was ripped out by Luke Wood
Miscellaneous Highlights: Alex Hales celebrated the end of his international exile
The game was played in Karachi's National Stadium in front of a sell-out crowd of 35,000
David Willey struggled with the new ball and leaked 26 runs in two overs
Lancashire left-armer Luke Wood had a solid introduction, allowing just 12 off his first two overs
Pakistan's openers, Mohammad Rizwan and Babar Azam, cashed in on a lightning outfield
Pakistan never quite got back to their best after their openers were parted, scoring 71 and losing six wickets in the second half of the innings
